current.terms_conditions_content:
What is Lorem Ipsum?

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
Why do we use it?
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

settings.contact_text_desc: When you meet with your personal jeweler in a virtual showroom, the experience will feel very similar to meeting with them in person, with numerous cameras spotlighting the jewels from all angles—a it's lot of fun and interactive!
settings.top_content: If you have an issue or question that requires immediate assistance, you can click blow to chat live with a customer service.  If we aren't available, drop us an email to the left and we'll respond within 24-48 hours.

settings.content_1: Our world is a gift and we are determined to give back to our community. As a company, we are taking the initiative to support non-profit organizations that highlight human rights issues that the modern world faces. We also want to contribute to any environmental movements within our industry. We take the pledge of donating 5% of our profits to help create a brighter future in the mining communities and neighborhoods we live in.

We want to provide our customers only high-quality jewelry along with the best purchasing experience. We offer exceptional jewelry and 100% real diamonds with the option to choose your own cut, clarity, color and carat. If at any point you questions about our company or diamonds, please don’t hesitate to contact our customer service team who is ready and available to you on chat, and email.

We make it simple to select your authentic diamond piece and customize it to your heart's content with just a few clicks.

settings.title: WHAT IS A LAB CREATED DIAMOND?
settings.content:
The history of lab-grown diamonds have been around since the 1950’s, but only recently have they begun to rise in popularity as an affordable and ethical alternative to mined diamonds.

However, the most pressing question about lab grown diamonds is whether they are genuine and considered real as mined diamonds.

Absolutely, YES.

The ONLY difference between a lab-created diamond and a natural diamond is its nature/origin. A lab-created diamond is "grown" in a laboratory using cutting-edge technology that mimics the natural diamond growth process. As a result, a man-made diamond that is chemically, physically, and optically identical to diamonds grown beneath the Earth's surface has been produced. Therefore, they are considered real diamonds and will be certified and graded as such. They are increasingly sought after for their more affordable pricing and environmentally friendly choice compared to natural diamonds.

Lab Grown Diamond is the only gem made of a single element: It is typically about 99.95 percent carbon, which is the same as Mined Diamonds.

Synthetic diamonds is a term used to describe lab-grown diamonds. Although not technically incorrect, the word "synthetic" can contribute to the perception that lab-grown diamonds are "fake." However, since lab-grown diamonds are truly identical in their chemical properties to natural diamonds, they should not be mistaken as diamond simulants such as moissanites or cubic zirconias which are not true carbon crystals.
settings.qoute_content: Lab Grown Diamond is the only gem made of a single element: It is typically about 99.95 percent carbon, which is the same as Mined Diamonds.

settings.title: HOW ARE LAB-CREATED DIAMONDS GROWN?
settings.content:
Our Partner at Diamond Foundry manufactures the lab-grown diamonds from one of their USA based facilities. Their laboratories have successfully tested the diamond growth process with modern reactor technology and perfected the art of creating unique, stunning diamonds while maintaining their reputation as a zero-carbon footprint company.

There are two systems that can be used to grow a diamond: a High Pressure High Temperature (HPHT) system and Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD)

Each of the three production processes is used to produce HPHT diamond: a belt press, a cubic press and a broken sphere (BARS). Both these processes produce a high-pressure atmosphere with a diamond-friendly temperature.

A diamond HPHT starts as a small carbon diamond seed. The seed is subjected to temperatures of approximately 1500°C and is pressurized to approximately 1.5 million pounds per square inch by one of the above processing methods.

The pure carbon begins to melt and forms a diamond around the initial seed. The purity of carbon diamond is carefully refreshed.

A CVD diamond starts with a thin slice, which is also a diamond manufactured from the HPHT. The diamond seed is then inserted into a sealed cavity, which is heated to approx. 800°C.

A carbon-rich gas like Methane is filled with the chamber and other gases. The gasses are ionized into plasma through the use of microwave or laser technologies. The ionization splits the molecular bond in the gasses and slowly crystallizes the pure carbon with the diamond seed.
settings.qoute_content: Our Partner at Diamond Foundry manufactures the lab-grown diamonds from one of their USA based facilities. Their laboratories have successfully tested the diamond growth process with modern reactor technology and perfected the art of creating unique, stunning diamonds while maintaining their reputation as a zero-carbon footprint company.

settings.title: HOW ARE LAB-CREATED DIAMONDS CERTIFIED AND GRADED?
settings.content:
Lab-grown diamonds produced by certified laboratories are graded and accredited using the same method as mined diamonds.

Diamonds are transmitted to a gem laboratory that specializes in diamonds grading. The rest of these laboratories have their own standards, including the 4's (cut, clear, color and carat)

Some of the most popular lab grown diamond certification labs are:
Gemological Institute of America (GIA)
Antwerp World Diamond Center (AWDC)
American Gem Society (AGS)
International Gemological Institute (IGI)


For all the diamond certification laboratories, the diamond grading procedure is about the same. Several gemologists in the lab classify each diamond separately. In order to decide the final ranking, the individual grades are compiled and analyzed.
settings.qoute_content: Lab-grown diamonds produced by certified laboratories are graded and accredited using the same method as mined diamonds.

settings.title: BENEFITS OF LAB-GROWN DIAMONDS
settings.content:
Affordable. The price of diamonds made in a laboratory is usually less expensive than diamonds extracted from the Earth. Why?
The cost of drilling, polishing and inspection is the same for mined diamonds and laboratory-created diamonds. However, the prices and procedures up to that stage are very different. Diamonds that are mined provide a long line of supplies. In order to transform a diamond from the raw form into a retail gemstone, miners, dealers, trimmerers, polishers, manufacturers of jewels and retailers are needed. On the other hand, by avoiding the extraction phase, the laboratory-made diamond supply chain is much shorter. In short, a laboratory-made diamond is less costly with less hands touching it.

Eco-Friendly. As other natural resource extraction, diamond mining has a significant environmental effect. In fairness, the diamond mining firms are well aware of this effect and have taken action to mitigate their impact on their surrounding environments. But laboratory diamonds are naturally and substantially less harmful than digging out of the earth since a diamond in a laboratory needs much less energy to expand in the atmosphere. In reality, it is in the interests of farmers to lower the resources they use to save money and reduce prices.

Conflict-Free. Several years ago, an illegal manufacturing method was revealed to the processed diamond industry. Also called blood diamonds or war diamonds, these diamonds were used to finance the abuse and manipulate miners and family members. These unethical activities have been greatly diminished by the Kimberley process, developed in 2003. In fact, 99.9% of natural diamonds are now estimated to be free of dispute.
If it is necessary for you to prevent confrontation or blood diamonds, though, lab-created diamonds give peace of mind that a natural diamond always cannot, and you can rest assured that you know the exact origin of your diamonds.
settings.qoute_content: If it is necessary for you to prevent confrontation or blood diamonds, though, lab-created diamonds give peace of mind that a natural diamond always cannot, and you can rest assured that you know the exact origin of your diamonds.

settings.title: LAB-CREATED VS. MINED
settings.content:
Over the period of increasing interest of lab-created diamonds, diamond shoppers are posing this exact question. However, only the shopper can answer it.

You can pick a mined diamond because you believe that it is of some importance and is one of the mysterious wonders of nature.

Or, since you believe it signifies a new love and the amazing advancement in science, you may be drawn to diamonds made from a laboratory.

Ultimately, lab-grown diamonds or natural diamonds, whichever it may be, they should both represent the love of a lifetime.
settings.qoute_content: Ultimately, lab-grown diamonds or natural diamonds, whichever it may be, they should both represent the love of a lifetime.

settings.question_faqs: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
settings.answer_faqs:
Please make sure that you follow below steps:

1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file: ella-x.x.x-sections-ready.zip in the folder Ella Sections Ready X.X.X, then you just need to upload ella-x.x.x-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

settings.question_faqs: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.answer_faqs:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

settings.question_faqs: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@halothemes.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off Item Animation / Effect if item on theme?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

settings.question_faqs: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

settings.question_faqs: What is included in the theme package?
settings.answer_faqs: The theme package includes Theme source, Photoshop design files and manual guide.

settings.question_faqs: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
settings.answer_faqs: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.

settings.question_faqs: Can I add borders around our product images?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.

settings.question_faqs: Can I have multi level menu?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
settings.answer_faqs: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support Variant Image?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://new-ella.myshopify.com/products/dinterdum-pretium-condimento?variant=16867481452642

settings.des_faqs: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to support@halothemes.com

settings.content: The cookie settings on this website are set to 'allow all cookies' to give you the very best experience. Please click Accept Cookies to continue to use the site.

settings.heading: Wear with Confidence
settings.slide-des: Lab grown, genuine diamonds with ethics at heart.

settings.banner_des: Configure the perfect engagement ring the cleanest way with our lab grown diamonds.

settings.title: 250 Tons of Earth Mining
settings.des: For every carat of diamond that is mined, nearly 100 sq. ft. of land is shattered, resulting in nearly 6,000 lbs. of mineral waste is created.

settings.title: 120 Gallons of Water Used for Mining
settings.des: Mined diamonds use up over 126 gallons of water per carat, whereas a lab-grown diamond consumes just 18.

settings.title: 143 lbs. of Carbon Dioxide
settings.des: Traditionally mined diamonds create over 250 lbs. of carbon, and more than 30 lbs. of Sulphur oxide. A lab-grown diamond emits just 6 lbs. of carbon, and no Sulphur oxide whatsoever.
